channel.title: Deployo Blog on Deployo
channel.description: Recent content in Deployo Blog on Deployo

item.title: Install and Manage Dokku on Linode
item.description: Dokku is a Heroku-like “docker-powered PaaS that helps you build and manage the lifecycle of applications”, as it says on its GitHub page. It has a simmilar git-centric interface for running and managing your applications. I will show you how to install and use Dokku on a Linode instance. I will be using Deployo to manage the server but you can also just SSH into the server and execute the same commands.
